DataElement.preferredDefinition: The name of a business engaged in supplies or apparatus used for research, diagnosis or therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The name of a business engaged in Supplies or apparatus used for cancer-related research, diagnosis or therapy.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An object needed to perform a diagnostic, therapeutic or research activity.

Concepts.definition: A manufactured object that is used to perform diagnostic, therapeutic or research activities.

Property.preferredDefinition: The name of a business engaged in manufacturing some product.

Concepts.definition: A person, enterprise, or entity that produces finished goods.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

DataElementConcept.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 10.6.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED.; 4/29/09 retired-phased out; superceded by new DEC 2866137 which includes concept for "name" which changed property.  3/12/09 released becaused used in CDE being proposed as caBIG data standard.  3/9/09 versioned for different OC concept per direction of EVS.  10/5/08 - released post NCIA Interim Rpt Changes;  4/21/08 - removed "Kind" from long name to be consistent with other NCIA/DICOM DECs to promote reuse in load of IVI AIM model.  10/9/07  versioned to match other DICOM CDEs semantics. using C43660 for equipment.   7/27/07 - removed name from long name as no underlying semantics found in DEC.  6/20/07 - released for reuse in DICOM Tag (0008,0070)

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: LO: A 64-character string with leading or trailing spaces being non-significant; NO CONTROL characters. [Standard-based]

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An expression consisting of a linear sequence of symbols (characters or words or phrases).:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: An expression consisting of a linear sequence of symbols (characters or words or phrases).

ValueDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
ValueDomain.changeDescription: 10/30/13 added DICOM RT CSI. jc 3/16/09 - set min length from 0 to 1. 2007 DICOM Standard - Sections 5 & 6 2006 DICOM Standard - Sections 5 & 6

DataElement.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
DataElement.changeDescription: 10.5.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED.; 4/28/09 superceded by CDE 2866141v1.0; remove "cancer-related" to make more generic since equipment could apply to non-cancer uses.  3/12/09 associated with Data Standard CSI; released per approval at 3/9/09 WS meeting.  3/9/09 versioned CDE for different equipment OC concept per direction by EVS. 2005 - Created for Imaging purposes; released for C3D FES study
